name: Dinner Tonight: Chickpea Flour Soup from Provence
description: How does this sound: a soup that takes five minutes to cook but tastes like the effort of several hours? That's the gist of this recipe from Rozanne Gold's latest book, Radically Simple.
recipeIngredient: 1 scallion, green part only, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine water, oil, garlic, and cumin. Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Reduce heat to low and whisk in chickpea flour. Return heat to high and boil for 3 minutes, until soup is consistency of heavy cream.
Ladle into bowls and top with scallion and freshly ground black pepper, if desired. Serve with lemon wedges.
